name: Acrobatic
text: You are skilled at leaping, jumping, and flying.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Acrobatics and Fly skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Acrobatics and Fly skill checks from Acrobatic increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat an Acrobatics or Fly check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你对于冲刺，跳跃和飞行颇有心得。
benefit_zh: 对于所有的特技和飞行检定获得+2奖励。如果某技能受训等级10以上，对于该技能检定的奖励为+4。
mythicText_zh: 你的灵动与优雅举世无双。
mythicBenefit_zh: 特技专家专长对特技动作与飞行技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次特技动作或者飞行检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。
